com.commercetools.sunrise.common.sessions

Class CacheableObjectStoringSessionCookieStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.commercetools.sunrise.common.sessions.SessionCookieStrategy
      • com.commercetools.sunrise.common.sessions.CacheableObjectStoringSessionCookieStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectStoringSessionStrategy, SessionStrategy

    public class CacheableObjectStoringSessionCookieStrategy
extends SessionCookieStrategy
implements ObjectStoringSessionStrategy
    Uses a session cookie to store string information about the user. Objects are first saved into the cache and uniquely associated with the user's session cookie with a generated session ID. For more information: Session in Play Framework

        Finds the object of type <U> associated with the given key in session.
        Specified by:
        findObjectByKey in interface ObjectStoringSessionStrategy
        Type Parameters:
        U - type of the object to be returned
        Parameters:
        key - the session key
        clazz - class of the expected returned object
        Returns:
        the object found in session, or empty if it could not be found or the class was not the expected one
